item.description:
Here's the link for the Dubliner.

Hosts will arrive by 4pm and we'll order some food around 5pm.  If you just want to hang out and chat, don't feel obligated to order dinner.  It's casual dining so no problem.  After an hour or two of friendly chat, we'll head out to the gaming area for some poker, slots, or whatever interests people.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be the ones wearing the hammers. We usually get a table over on the right side of the room.
item.why: Hail Heathens! We're heading back to an old favorite location for the first gathering of 2011. Hope you can join us for a bit of socializing over good food and perhaps even some gambling afterwards.

group.name: Connecticut & Western Mass Asatru Meetup Group

item.name: CasinoMoot
